meanings.definition: A person who maintains the grounds of a property.
meanings.sent1: The groundskeepers work hard to keep the gardens neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: The groundskeepers mow the lawn and plant flowers around the estate.
meanings.sent3: The groundskeepers joked that they were the real rulers of the land.
meanings.sent4: The groundskeepers are the unsung heroes of the property, silently beautifying it.
meanings.sent5: The groundskeepers' dedication to their work is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The group of people responsible for caring for the landscaping and outdoor areas of a property.
meanings.sent1: Our team of groundskeepers takes pride in maintaining the entire property.
meanings.sent2: The groundskeepers gather every morning to plan their tasks for the day.
meanings.sent3: The groundskeepers organized a fun outdoor event for the residents.
meanings.sent4: The groundskeepers are like artists, painting the landscape with their care.
meanings.sent5: The groundskeepers ensure that every corner of the property looks inviting.
